title: Alloy
summary: Alloy is a color theme available for VS Code, Prismjs, Windows Terminal, and ConEmu.

title: Auto Class
summary: Automatically apply CSS classes to the markdown based on a note's path and tags.

title: Collapse All
summary: When your Obsidian file explorer is overloaded with open folders, close them all with a single click or command. Or, if you want to explore your folder tree, expand all folders.

title: Crypt UI
summary: A sci-fi themed CSS component library, written mainly to support implementation of Cryptomancer FVTT.
An implementation of the Cryptomancer RPG system for Foundry Virtual Tabletop.
title: Cryptomancer FVTT

summary: A repo of any and all maps I make for Doom. So far, only one map, but I certainly plan to make more!
title: Doom WADs

summary: Transform boring GitHub links in notes into tags with rich content from GitHub, and query issues and pull requests within your notes.
title: GitHub Link

summary: Patches the Foundry VTT combat tracker so that clicking on a combatant pans to that combatant - even if they are on another scene.
title: Go to Combatant

summary: Homebrewery VS Code is a VS Code extension for rendering markdown in the style of the Homebrewery for creating Dungeons and Dragons 5e homebrew content inside VS Code.
title: Homebrewery VS Code

summary: Patches the Foundry VTT journal so that creating a new page in a journal entry places it after the currently viewed page, not at the end of the list.
title: Insert Journal Page

summary: Connect your Trello cards with your Obsidian notes to see and update labels, comments, and checklists from within Obsidian.
title: Obsidian Trello

summary: A fancy, cross platform launcher for Doom and its descendants
title: Phobos Launcher
